query: mutation(  $email: String!,  $name: String!,  $picture: String!, $clientID: String,  $email_verified: Boolean,  $global_client_id: String,  $nickname: String,$user_id: String,  $created_at: String,  $updated_at: String) {  upsert_user(auth_profile: {    email: $email,    name: $name,    picture: $picture,    clientID: $clientID,    email_verified: $email_verified,    global_client_id: $global_client_id,    nickname: $nickname,    user_id: $user_id,    created_at: $created_at,    updated_at: $updated_at  }) {    profile {      email      name      picture    } facility {      id      name      location    }    }  }
